name: @soos-io/soos-sast
description: SOOS Static Application Security Testing (SAST) scanning support. Register for a free SOOS trial at https://app.soos.io/register

scripts.setup:clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && (npm outdated || exit 0)
scripts.link:soos-api-client: npm link @soos-io/api-client && npm run build && npm link
scripts.patch-api-client: npm run patch && npm run setup:clean && npm install @soos-io/api-client@latest --save-exact && npm install && npm run check

author: SOOS
